p: Results: 240 patients were admitted in ICU for a 3 month period of which 42 patients died in ICU (17.5%) 2 patients died in the ward following withdrawal of care.29(65.9%) of whom had died followed withdrawal or withholding of care.11(18% of the dead)had spontaneous cardiac arrest or `Brain Dead.all patients who had limitation of therapy had family consensus,of which 2 were autonomous decision of the patients.
